attributes.action: We demand all MP’s resign and local and general elections be held to replace.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament, across all parties, has presided over one of the most shameful and embarrassing periods in British political history and we, the British public, have had enough.

They have time and time again refused to compromise from their positions to find a common ground that works for the whole country, and one that ensures the best outcome for the UK and Europe.
attributes.background:
We the British public believe the MP’s elected to represent us have been using Brexit for their own personal and political gain. 

We have no confidence in parliament and expect every MP to resign and for elections to be held across the country to allow more competent representatives to be found.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
